---
title: "Vignette Figures"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r aleza-map}

aleza <- sf::st_read(system.file("extdata/aleza.gpkg", 
                                 package = "PEMprepr"), 
                     quiet = TRUE)

aoi <- sf::st_read(system.file("extdata/aleza_nw.gpkg", 
                               package = "PEMprepr"), 
                   quiet = TRUE)

g <- ggplot() + geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = aleza, colour = "green", fill = "darkgreen") + 
  geom_sf(data = aoi, colour = "coral1", lwd = 2, fill = NA) + 
  # labs(title = "Aleza Lake Research Forest - Northwest Quadrant") +
  theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 6))

ggsave(plot = g, "vignettes/aleza.png", dpi = 150,
       width = 4, height = 3.75)

```
